name: prithwis-portfolio-root
description: Root package.json for Render deployment routing

scripts.build: echo 'Starting build process...' && npm run install-backend && echo 'Build complete!'
scripts.install-backend: echo 'Installing backend dependencies...' && cd backend && npm install --production && echo 'Backend dependencies installed'
scripts.install-frontend: echo 'Installing frontend dependencies...' && cd frontend && npm install && echo 'Frontend dependencies installed'
scripts.build-frontend: npm run install-frontend && cd frontend && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.health-check: cd backend && node -e "console.log('Backend health check passed')"
scripts.verify-deps: cd backend && node -e "require('express'); require('cors'); require('node-fetch'); require('dotenv'); console.log('All dependencies verified')"

author: Prithwis Das
